column5: Stoty, I went out for dinner in Detroit last year with Gerald and a couple of guys from the Northern tourney in Woodhaven  and its true. That guy has those things stashed everywhere. Boat, Tacle, Hunting gear etc. Its funny to watch him in person talk about them.
"there's nothing worse than running your finger through the paper"  :rofl2:
What Happens on the tourney trail  Stays on the tourney trail
Soooo jealous!!!! Gerald is one of my fav's!
That is one of the funniest videos I have seen in a long time.

"I'll stop right err the middle of the day and pull a maintenance, I've seen people doin' it, walking around all day, haha, NOT ME! I could be visitin' the pope, ahuh, I'ma take 5! I'll be right back"
Those wipes are the first thing I pack for any hunting or fishing trip.
Haha, too funny. Thanks for the post Stoty
I cant belive I just watched that entire video..Seriously folks, is there nothing prvate anymore? yikes.....Somone should hide all his wipes so he has to go back to poke thru.....
I thought that video has something to do with boat maintenance or something.  Thank god my boss is in a meeting in the war room.  That guys hillarious.
